definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
perspiration/sweat/CL:滴[di1],頭|头[tou2],身[shen1]/to be speechless (out of helplessness, embarrassment etc) (Internet slang used as an interjection)
see 可汗[ke4 han2], 汗國|汗国[han2 guo2]

sentences.english: Usually at this time of the year, Fang should be sweating in the fields.
sentences.chinese: 通常一年中這個時候，方應該在田地裏滿頭大汗的。

sentences.english: Chen is full of sweat with heat so that he has to untie the buttons of blue shirt.
sentences.chinese: 陳老師熱得滿頭大汗，索性將藍色襯衣的扣子解開。

sentences.english: Xiao gang full head big sweat from the river to play water to help young trees watered.
sentences.chinese: 小剛滿頭大汗的從小河邊打來水幫小樹澆水。

sentences.english: He got up on the tree, quite frightened, sweating like a pig.
sentences.chinese: 他爬到了樹頂上，嚇得滿頭大汗。

sentences.english: Recording space, sweat haired Liao accepted the reporter's late-night visit.
sentences.chinese: 錄製間隙，滿頭大汗的廖健接受記者的深夜造訪。

sentences.english: Passing by the football field, I saw several boys playing football with sweat covering their faces like rain.
sentences.chinese: 路過足球場，幾個男孩子正在踢球，踢得滿頭大汗。

sentences.english: One day Hong came back home after buying some food and was sweating cats and dogs.
sentences.chinese: 這天洪小玲買菜回來，累得滿頭大汗。

sentences.english: Is sweating profusely , removes the throat to say to the security.
sentences.chinese: 滿頭大汗，撤着嗓子衝着保安說道。

sentences.english: Suddenly the door, "Ziya" A opened, profuse sweating and Song were back.
sentences.chinese: 忽然門“吱呀”一聲開了，宋國人滿頭大汗地回來了。

sentences.english: And he was perspiring with anger and he was very angry and he went.
sentences.chinese: 他因憤怒滿頭大汗，他非常生氣，他就走了。

sentences.english: At dusk, the man got home, sweat dripping from his head.
sentences.chinese: 黃昏時分，那個宋國人滿頭大汗地回到家裏。

sentences.english: Finally the glove was on and I was already sweating.
sentences.chinese: 最後將手套戴上的時候，我已經滿頭大汗。

sentences.english: Watching my sweating father, I can feel his love for me.
sentences.chinese: 看着滿頭大汗的爸爸，我感覺到了父愛。

sentences.english: Open the door, I pale, sweating, mother asked me?
sentences.chinese: 打開門，我一臉蒼白，滿頭大汗，媽媽問我怎麼了？

sentences.english: Lin Yue feels he or she already full head big perspiration.
sentences.chinese: 林躍感覺自己已經滿頭大汗了。

sentences.english: Madeleine rose, he was pale, though dripping with perspiration.
sentences.chinese: 馬德蘭站起來，儘管滿頭大汗，臉色卻是青的。

definition: head and face filthy with grime (idiom)/covered in dirt/dejected and depressed
to act with confusion/to be in a flurry/to be flustered
to leap and frisk about (idiom); lively/healthy and active
to turn red (in the face)/to flush (with embarrassment or anger)
out of breath (idiom)/to gasp for air
pinyin: shang4 qi4 bu4 jie1 xia4 qi4

definition: to rant and rave/to be scared, upset (Beijing dialect)
to swear while talking/to be foul-mouthed
